name: Re-unite
description:
It's an era of changes.

You were the king. But your realm has been taken over by misterious forces. To fight the evil invaders you need money. Your spouses are being kept in a dangerous dungeon, filled with lava on every floor. Each of your spouses has a precious ring. So...

Get ready to find your spouses (and their rings), and get as much money... Ehr, I mean love as you can. Obviously try not to get burnt in the process.

Game made with TIC-80 for the Fantasy Console game jam in less than 1 week
